verbs.description: [V: snapcrap] [ARG0: app] aims to provide exposure to san francisco public poop problem a new app called snapcrap allows users to take a photograph of human waste on sidewalks in san francisco so city crews can clean it up los angeles times miller citys public works department facebook san francisco city public works department
